author: aconway
msg: NO-JIRA: Removed useless flow control code from qpid-send.
This code serves no purpose now that qpidd has producer flow control.
Removed it to simplify the tests.

author: aconway
msg: NO-JIRA: Control running of cluster tests.
Previously cluster tests would run if cluster services were running, even
if build was explicitly configured without CPG. Don't run cluster tests
unless the build is configured with CPG.
If the build is configured *with* CPG, you can still skip the CPG tests by setting

author: aconway
msg: QPID-3603: Minor improvements to HA tests, documentation and examples.

author: aconway
msg: QPID-3603: Add heartbeat and reconnect options to qpid-cluster-benchmark
